definition: to dredge/to clear away obstruction/thin/sparse/scanty/distant (relation)/not close/to neglect/negligent/to present a memorial to the Emperor/commentary/annotation
loose/to loosen/to relax/floss (dry, fluffy food product made from shredded, seasoned meat or fish, used as a topping or filling)

sentences.english: Objective To study the preventive and therapeutic effects of Migu granule on osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究密骨顆粒對骨質疏鬆症的防治作用。

sentences.english: It will be effective for the arthritis and the osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 黑升麻常用於關節炎和骨質疏鬆症。

sentences.english: Bisphosphonate have bone? seeking affinity, some of them are used as drugs for osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 雙膦酸鹽有趨骨性並有抗骨質疏鬆症活性。

sentences.english: Calcitonin is mainly used in the treatment of osteoporosis with high turn-over and prominent pain.
sentences.chinese: 降鈣素主要適用於高轉換型骨質疏鬆症伴疼痛明顯者。

sentences.english: Primary osteoporosis is a systemic disease characterized by osteopenia and degeneration of bone microstructure.
sentences.chinese: 人們在患上骨質疏鬆症之前，首先會骨質減少。

sentences.english: Conclusion Migu granule has preventive and therapeutic effects on osteoporosis in mice.
sentences.chinese: 結論密骨顆粒對骨質疏鬆症有較好的防治作用。

sentences.english: Soda will leach the calcium out of your bones and promote osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 蘇打會從你的骨骼中汲取鈣最終導致骨質疏鬆症。

sentences.english: There is a link between the consumption of coffee and osteoporosis in women.
sentences.chinese: 在飲用咖啡和女性的骨質疏鬆症之間有某種聯繫。

sentences.english: Cage layer fatigue is a type of osteoporosis .
sentences.chinese: 籠養蛋雞疲勞症是骨質疏鬆症的一種類型。

sentences.english: Calcium, vitamin D and involutional osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 鈣，維生素D和更年期骨質疏鬆症。

sentences.english: Objective To study the efficacy of risedronate sodium in prevention and treatment for postmenopausal osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察利塞膦酸鈉防治絕經後骨質疏鬆症的療效。

sentences.english: Raloxifene is also used in prevention and treatment of osteoporosis in postmenopausal women.
sentences.chinese: 雷洛昔芬還被用於防治絕經後婦女骨質疏鬆症。

sentences.english: Steroidal hormones are often used in prevention and treatment of osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 甾體激素常用於骨質疏鬆症的防治。

sentences.english: And there was another discovery in the hospital. She had osteoporosis.
sentences.chinese: 在醫院，他們還發現，她患有骨質疏鬆症。

sentences.english: To evaluate the therapeutic effect of Bushen Zhuanggu Granule (BZG) for menopausal osteoporosis (MO) .
sentences.chinese: 客觀評價補腎壯骨沖劑治療絕經後骨質疏鬆症的療效。
骨質疏鬆症是一種骨密度變稀的疾病。

definition: choroid (vascular layer of the eyeball between the retina and the sclera)
